metadata.title: CVE-2023-5631 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Roundcube before 1.4.15, 1.5.x before 1.5.5, and 1.6.x before 1.6.4 allowsstored XSS via an HTML e-mail message with a crafted SVG document becauseof program/lib/Roundcube/rcube_washtml.php behavior. This could allow aremote attacker to load arbitrary JavaScript code.

criterions.comment: roundcube package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
